get.summary:
Get a list of azure marketplace catalog offers and total count and facets

Note

Search API version 2022-08-17-preview will retire on March 31, 2024. After this date, this API version will no longer be supported. To continue using our services, it is essential to migrate to the new Search API preview version 2023-01-01.
For detailed guidance, please refer to the updated API documentation, available at: 2023-01-01-preview
If you have any questions or require assistance during the transition, please contact us at MKPL_Platform_API_DL@microsoft.com

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: The search text. Such as searchQuery=red hat

parameters.name: publisherDisplayName
parameters.description: The search publisher name. Such as publisherDisplayName=red hat

parameters.name: azureBenefit
parameters.description:
Define the search for only azure benefit eligible offers, if no value selected, this filter is ignored. Default: null. 
- `Eligible`: Eligible.
- `NotEligible`: Not Eligible.

parameters.name: publisherTypes
parameters.description:
Define the search publisher types, Possible values: Microsoft, ThirdParty. Default: Microsoft. 
- `Microsoft`: Microsoft.
- `ThirdParty`: Third Party.

parameters.name: badges
parameters.description:
The following product badges are available: 
- `PreferredSolution`: Preferred Solution.
- `PowerBICertified`: power BI Certified.
- `AdditionalPurchaseRequirement`: Additional Purchase Requirement.

parameters.name: industryCloud
parameters.description:
Define the search for IndustryCloud offers. Default: NotApplicable. 
- `NotApplicable`: Not Applicable.
- `True`: True.
- `False`: False.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language to search, ISO 639-1 two-letter code, possible values - 'en,cs,de,es,fr,hu,it,ja,ko,nl,pl,pt-br,pt-pt,ru,sv,tr,zh-hans,zh-hant'

parameters.name: gallery
parameters.description: Gallery to search by. Such as Azure

parameters.name: select
parameters.description:
Array of fields to return. Such as 'pricingTypes'. 
- `All`: All fields.
- `Popularity`: Popularity.
- `ApplicableProducts`: Applicable Products.
- `CategoryIds`: Category Ids.
- `Market`: Market.
- `LinkedAddIns`: Linked AddIns.
- `SupportedProducts`: Supported Products.
- `HideKeys`: Hide Keys.
- `PublisherId`: Publisher Id.
- `CspStates`: Csp States.
- `DisplayName`: Display Name.
- `AzureBenefit`: Azure Benefit.
- `Badges`: Badges.
- `SmallIconUri`: Small Icon Uri.
- `MediumIconUri`: Medium Icon Uri.
- `LargeIconUri`: Large Icon Uri.
- `WideIconUri`: Wide Icon Uri.
- `IndustryCloud`: Industry Cloud.
- `PublisherType`: Publisher Type.
- `PublishingState`: Publishing State.
- `Language`: Language.
- `UniqueProductId`: Unique Product Id.
- `ProductType`: Product Type.
- `Plans`: Plans.
- `OperatingSystems`: Operating Systems.
- `PricingTypes`: Pricing Types.
- `PublisherDisplayName`: Publisher Display Name.
- `Summary`: Summary.
- `VmImageGenerations`: Vm Image Generations.
- `VmSecurityTypes`: Vm Security Types.
- `VmArchitectureTypes`: Vm Architecture Types.
- `Description`: Description.
- `RatingBuckets`: Rating Buckets.
- `RatingAverage`: Rating Average.

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Array of sort by fields to order by, if none selected then ignored. For example, orderby=Popularity

parameters.name: productTypes
parameters.description:
Array of product types to search by. Such as 'VirtualMachine'.
- `None`: None.
- `DevService`: Dev Service.
- `ManagedApplication`: Managed Application.
- `VirtualMachine`: Virtual Machine.
- `AzureApplication`: Azure Application.
- `Container`: Container.
- `SaaS`: SaaS.
- `SolutionTemplate`: Solution Template.
- `IotEdgeModules`: Iot Edge Modules.
- `ManagedServices`: Managed Services.
- `ContainerApps`: Container Apps.
- `VisualStudioExtension`: Visual Studio Extension.
- `DynamicsOps`: Dynamics Ops.
- `DynamicsCE`: Dynamics CE.
- `DynamicsBC`: Dynamics BC.
- `PowerBI`: PowerBI.
- `ConsultingServices`: Consulting Services.
- `CosellOnly`: Cosell Only.
- `CoreVirtualMachine`: Core Virtual Machine.
- `PowerBIVisuals`: PowerBI Visuals.
- `Office365`: Office365.
- `AADApps`: Azure Active Directory Apps.
- `AzureServices`: Azure Services

parameters.name: pricingTypes
parameters.description:
Array of pricing types to search by. 
- `Free`: The product has at least one plan that is free of charge.
- `FreeTrial`: The product has at least one plan that is free trial.
- `Byol`: The product has at least one plan that is bring your own license.
- `Payg`: The product has at least one plan that is Pay as you go, usage based billing model.
- `RI`: The product has at least one plan that is Reserved Instance billing model.

parameters.name: industries
parameters.description: Array of Product industries, Possible values - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-categories-industries#industries. Such as 'retailers'

parameters.name: operatingSystems
parameters.description: Array of operating systems to search by, if none selected then filter is ignored, this is relevant for Virtual Machine product type only. Such as operatingSystems=windows,linux

parameters.name: hideKeys
parameters.description: Array of hideKeys for preview search by. Such as '22c6b3ae-1111-1111-1111-e7cbdc8569dd'

parameters.name: categoryIds
parameters.description: Array of product categories, https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-categories-industries#categories. Such as 'Productivity'

parameters.name: market
parameters.description: Product sold market, Possible values - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-geo-availability-currencies. Such as 'US'

parameters.name: linkedAddIns
parameters.description: Array of linkedAddIns to search by, For SaaS products only, https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/monetize-addins-through-microsoft-commercial-marketplace.

parameters.name: supportedProducts
parameters.description: Array of supported products to search by. Such as 'CRM'

parameters.name: applicableProducts
parameters.description: Array of M365 products applicable. Such as 'Office365'

parameters.name: publisherIds
parameters.description: Array of publisher ids to return. Such as 'Microsoft'

parameters.name: ratingBuckets
parameters.description:
Array of azure portal rating buckets to search by. Such as 'Above1'.
- `AboveOne`: Above One.
- `AboveTwo`: Above Two.
- `AboveThree`: Above Three.
- `AboveFour`: Above Four

parameters.name: vmImageGenerations
parameters.description: Array of vm generations to search by, See Azure support for generation 2 VMs - Azure Virtual Machines | Microsoft Docs, Possible values, 1,2. Such as '1'

parameters.name: vmArchitectureTypes
parameters.description: Array of Virtual Machine image architecture types to search by, 1-x64, 2-ARM. Such as '1'

parameters.name: vmSecurityTypes
parameters.description:
Array of vm security types to search by. Such as 'Trusted'.
- `None`: None.
- `Trusted`: Trusted.
- `Confidential`: Confidential

parameters.name: publishingStage
parameters.description:
Audience. Default: Preview.
- `Preview`: Preview.
- `Public`: Public

parameters.name: facets
parameters.description:
Array facets to facet by, if none selected then no facets will return. Such as facets=pricingTypes,operatingSystems. 
- `All`: All fields.
- `Popularity`: Popularity.
- `ApplicableProducts`: Applicable Products.
- `CategoryIds`: Category Ids.
- `Market`: Market.
- `LinkedAddIns`: Linked AddIns.
- `SupportedProducts`: Supported Products.
- `HideKeys`: Hide Keys.
- `PublisherId`: Publisher Id.
- `CspStates`: Csp States.
- `DisplayName`: Display Name.
- `AzureBenefit`: Azure Benefit.
- `Badges`: Badges.
- `SmallIconUri`: Small Icon Uri.
- `MediumIconUri`: Medium Icon Uri.
- `LargeIconUri`: Large Icon Uri.
- `WideIconUri`: Wide Icon Uri.
- `IndustryCloud`: Industry Cloud.
- `PublisherType`: Publisher Type.
- `PublishingState`: Publishing State.
- `Language`: Language.
- `UniqueProductId`: Unique Product Id.
- `ProductType`: Product Type.
- `Plans`: Plans.
- `OperatingSystems`: Operating Systems.
- `PricingTypes`: Pricing Types.
- `PublisherDisplayName`: Publisher Display Name.
- `Summary`: Summary.
- `VmImageGenerations`: Vm Image Generations.
- `VmSecurityTypes`: Vm Security Types.
- `VmArchitectureTypes`: Vm Architecture Types.
- `Description`: Description.
- `RatingBuckets`: Rating Buckets.
- `RatingAverage`: Rating Average.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of items to skip. Minimum: 0

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Number of items to return. Minimum: 0, Maximum: 50000, Default: 20.

parameters.name: x-ms-app
parameters.description: The Application named property has the name of the client application that makes the request, used for tracing. Such as x-ms-app=appsource

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the REST API used for the request.

200.description: Returns a list of Azure Marketplace catalog offers and total count and facets

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 400 - In case request malformed.

 * 500 - In case internal error.

ErrorResponseDetails.description: The search error response details object

code.description: The error code description. Such as code=InternalError

message.description: The error message. Such as message=Internal server error

RatingBucket.description: Azure portal rating bucket to search by. Such as 'Above1'

VmSecurityType.description: Vm security type, Possible values: Trusted, Confidential, None.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next page of API search

categoryIds.description: Array of product categories, https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/marketplace-categories-industries#categories. Such as 'Productivity'

azureBenefit.description: Eligibility for Azure consumption commitment benefit (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/azure-consumption-commitment-benefit), Possible values: Eligible, NotEligible, if no value selected, this filter is ignored. Default: null

badges.description: The following product badges are available: preferredSolution, powerBICertified, AdditionalPurchaseRequirement

publishingStage.description: Publishing Stage, can be Live or Preview

operatingSystems.description: Array of operating systems to search by, if none selected then filter is ignored, this is relevant for Virtual Machine product type only. Such as operatingSystems=windows,linux

pricingTypes.description: The list of the pricing types for which this offer is designated

vmImageGenerations.description: Array of vm generations to search by, see Azure support for generation 2 VMs - Azure Virtual Machines | Microsoft Docs, Possible values, 1,2. Such as '1'

vmArchitectureTypes.description: Array of Virtual Machine image architecture types to search by, 1-x64, 2-ARM. Such as '1'

vmSecurityTypes.description: Vm security types, Possible values, Trusted, Confidential, None.

smallIconUri.description: URI to the small product icon

mediumIconUri.description: URI to the medium product icon

largeIconUri.description: URI to the large product icon

wideIconUri.description: URI to the wide product icon

ratingBuckets.description: Rating buckets, Above1, Above2, Above3, Above4. Above5

linkedAddIns.description: List of linked Add Ins supported by the product

plans.description: List of plans that are available for this product

AzureBenefit.description: Eligibility for Azure consumption commitment benefit (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/azure-consumption-commitment-benefit), Possible values: Eligible, NotEligible, if no value selected, this filter is ignored. Default: null

market.description: The market for which the starting price is calculated.

cspState.description: A value indicating whether the product is available for purchase through CSP channel

uniquePlanId.description: Unique plan Id which is obtained by combining uniqueProductId1 and PlanId with no separator in between

vmArchitectureType.description: The VM image architecture type, x64, ARM

uiDefinitionUri.description: What Azure portal view to open when someone wants to create a marketplace item

pricingTypes.description: The list of the pricing types for which this plan is designated

isQuantifiable.description: A value indicating whether the plan is quantifiable

artifacts.description: Plan level resources and configuration files

type.description: The plan type, for Azure Application product type, this can be Solution Template or ManagedApp

purchaseDurationDiscounts.description: The percentage discount for third party virtual machines software reservations

isPrivate.description: Indication that the plan is accessible to restricted audience only

CspState.description: PA value showing whether the product is available for purchase through CSP channel, Possible values, OptIn, OptOut, SelectiveOptIn, for more information see, https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/marketplace/cloud-solution-providers

altStackReference.description: Pointing to a planId which holds the alternative stack reference

relatedSkus.description: Pointing to a planId that is related to this plan

RelatedSku.description: Pointing to a planId that is related to this plan

Artifact.description: Plan level resources and configuration files

PurchaseDurationDiscount.description: The percentage discount for 3rd party virtual machines software reservations

Link.description: Links to publisher external references documents

IndustryCloud.description: Define the search for IndustryCloud, see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/industry/
